lead_paragraph: Top seed Novak Djokovic cannot seem able to get a match in at the U.S. Open, as the world number one was given another rapid advance when Russian Mikhail Youzhny retired due to a leg injury when trailing 4-2 in the first set on Friday.
snippet: Top seed Novak Djokovic cannot seem able to get a match in at the U.S. Open, as the world number one was given another rapid advance when Russian Mikhail Youzhny retired due to a leg injury when trailing 4-2 in the first set on Friday....

headline.main: Rested Djokovic Gets Another Slide at U.S. Open
headline.print_headline: Rested Djokovic Gets Another Slide at U.S. Open
